system.description: This spell allows you to scribe a potent rune of power upon a surface. When triggered, a symbol of pain causes wracking pains that impose a -4 penalty on attack rolls, skill checks, and ability checks. These pains last for 1 hour. The symbol can be triggered by creatures of a particular type, or by all creatures. The symbol is invisible and is triggered by reading it (or by passing within 60 feet, if you so choose). A successful Disable Device check (DC 28) can disarm the symbol. Magic trap guidelines apply. The symbol lasts until discharged or 1 hour per caster level. You cannot use a symbol of pain on a creature that is not subject to pain.

components.materialDescription: Mercury and phosphorus, plus powdered diamond and opal worth 1,000 gp (consumed).
